attributes.action: create a single rate of taxation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The british taxation system is far to complicated.
We need to repair the inherent flaws that bind the system through over complication. A standard rate of taxation for every pound earned and spent either by individuals or corporations, would simplfy the whole system. Forbes (American Publisher) has suggested a rate of 19%. He has done a lot of research on the advantages and is lobbying the American government to alter their system. we should do the same.
